mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, "%Y-%m-%d") date, COUNT(1) count FROM tb_article a GROUP BY date ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT a.id, article_cover, article_title, SUBSTR(article_content, 1, 500) AS article_content, a.create_time, a.type, a.is_top, a.category_id, category_name, t.id AS tag_id, t.tag_name FROM (SELECT id, article_cover, article_title, article_content, type, is_top, create_time, category_id FROM tb_article WHERE is_delete = 0 AND status = 1 ORDER BY is_top DESC, id DESC LIMIT #{current}, #{size}) a JOIN tb_category c ON a.category_id = c.id JOIN tb_article_tag atg ON a.id = atg.article_id JOIN tb_tag t ON t.id = atg.tag_id ORDER BY a.is_top DESC, a.id DESC

SELECT a.id, article_title, article_cover, article_content, a.create_time FROM (SELECT DISTINCT article_id FROM (SELECT tag_id FROM tb_article_tag WHERE article_id = #{articleId}) t LEFT JOIN tb_article_tag tat ON tat.tag_id = t.tag_id) a1 JOIN tb_article a ON a.id = a1.article_id WHERE a.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY a.is_top DESC, a.id DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT a.id, article_cover, article_title, article_content, a.type, a.original_url, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.category_id, category_name, t.id AS tag_id, t.tag_name FROM (select * from tb_article WHERE id = #{articleId} AND is_delete = 0 AND status = 1 ) a JOIN tb_category c ON a.category_id = c.id JOIN tb_article_tag atg ON a.id = atg.article_id JOIN tb_tag t ON t.id = atg.tag_id;
